summary: Frontend routing appears to remove/avoid the Internet Identity-based admin access route, but the diff does not provide enough evidence that the Internet Identity UI/gating was fully removed across the admin area or that the backend admin credential initialization was updated to the specified fixed username/password using the existing hashPassword flow. Some additional admin-guard-related components were modified/introduced without a clear link to the requested changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update backend admin credential initialization so the only valid admin login is username "Thejas Kinnigoli" with password "789852qwertyuiop", stored/checked via the existing password hashing mechanism.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo is truncated before any admin credential initialization or adminLogin implementation details are shown, so there is no evidence that the fixed username/password was set or that hashPassword is used for storage/verification.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove Internet Identity (passkey) authentication requirements and UI from the admin area so admin access is granted only via username/password admin session flow.
missing_requirements.reason: App routing changes suggest the /admin/access route was removed, but the diff does not show the contents of AdminAccessPage or any admin UI components/guards where Internet Identity prompts or gating might exist. There is also no evidence that the relevant guard logic was updated to rely only on the username/password admin session validation.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/modification of an OwnerOnlyRouteGuard component (owner/principal-based gating).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly moves away from Internet Identity/principal-based admin auth and does not request adding an owner-only/principal-based route guard; this may reintroduce non-goal behavior or be unrelated to the requested username/password flow.
